bibl.title: Studies in Honor of T.B.L. Webster. I
bibl.note: How much does Menander owe to his comic forebears, how much to earlier tragedy?
bibl.seg: Arnott W. Geoffrey, Menander and Earlier Drama.
J.H. Betts, J.T. Hooker and J.R. Green (Edd.), Studies in Honor of T.B.L. Webster. I (Bristol, 1986) pp. 1-9.
